Scoring#

In order to win the war, points are what matter most! Here is how points will be totaled. The country with the most points will secure victory!

Method

Points

Description

Defeated Character

100

These will be awarded for every character you defeat on the opposing side. Go get ‘em!

Differential Bonus

150

These points will be awarded for every character that is alive on your team by the end of a game. These will always be rewarded, even on the losing team.

Winner’s Bonus

200

Your country won the war - congratulations! Now the land can know peace. Here’s a little extra something for your efforts!

Points Table#

Here’s a table showing how the score will change depending on how many characters are alive on the winning team.

Final Score Formula#

# of defeated characters (100) + # of alive characters on your team (150) + winner's bonus

Ties#

It is possible for ties to occur in this game. This will occur as long as both teams have the same amount of characters alive
